alert.note: Alert for Eastern Kiowa County; Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 07 at 4:10AM MST until January 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Kiowa, Bent, and Prowers Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
